This process aims to ensure that statements or claims are based on reliable and verifiable information while eliminating inaccurate or misleading content.

KISS performs the song "Rock and Roll All Nite," which is often mistakenly referred to as "I Wanna Rock 'n' Roll All Night." It is important to note that "I Wanna Rock" is a different song by Twisted Sister.
